trans-unit.source: Represents a multiplexing logger.
trans-unit.target: 表示多工記錄器。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this logger is to register and unregister multiple loggers during the build.
trans-unit.target: 這個記錄器的用途是要在建置期間註冊和取消註冊多個記錄器。

trans-unit.source: Supports the Visual Studio IDE scenario in which loggers are registered and unregistered for each project system’s build request.
trans-unit.target: 支援針對每個專案系統之組建要求註冊和移除註冊記錄器的 Visual Studio IDE 情節。

trans-unit.source: One physical build can have multiple logical builds, each with its own set of loggers.
trans-unit.target: 一個實體組建可以有多個邏輯組建，每一個都有它自己的一組記錄器。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="MuxLogger" /> registers itself with the build manager as a regular central /l style logger.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MuxLogger" /> 會向組建管理程式將本身註冊為一般中央 /l 樣式記錄器。

trans-unit.source: It receives messages from the build manager and routes them to the correct logger, based on the logical build that the message came from.
trans-unit.target: 它會從組建管理員接收訊息，並根據訊息的來源邏輯建置，將它們傳送到正確的記錄器。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` generally functions as follows:
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`通常函式，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` is registered at the beginning of the build manager’s Begin build.
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`註冊的組建管理員開始建置開頭。

trans-unit.source: Any loggers registered before the build manager starts the build get the build-started event at the same time as the `MuxLogger`.
trans-unit.target: 註冊後，組建管理程式隨即啟動建置任何記錄器取得組建啟動事件做為同時`MuxLogger`。

trans-unit.source: Any loggers registered after the build manager starts the build get a synthesized build-started event.
trans-unit.target: 任何組建管理員啟動建置後註冊的記錄器取得合成的組建啟動的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event cannot be cached because the timestamp of the build-started event is determined when the event is created, and caching the event would give incorrect build times in the loggers registered to the `MuxLogger`.
trans-unit.target: 無法快取事件，因為組建啟動事件的時間戳記決定事件建立時，並快取事件會提供不正確的建置時間中註冊的記錄器`MuxLogger`。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` is initialized by the build manager
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`已由組建管理員初始化

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` listens to all events on the event source from the build manager and routes events correctly to the registered loggers.
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`從組建管理員會接聽事件來源上的所有事件，並正確地將事件路由至已註冊的記錄器。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` is shutdown when the build is finished in end build.
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`在組建中結束建置完成時關閉。

trans-unit.source: At this time, it unregisters any loggers attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 在這個階段中，它會移除註冊任何附加的記錄器。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` logs the build-finished event when the project-finished event for the first project-started event is seen for each logger.
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`記錄時每個記錄器都會出現的第一個專案啟動事件的專案完成事件完成建置後事件。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` registers loggers in the following way:
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`記錄器註冊方式如下：

trans-unit.source: The logger is passed to the `MuxLogger.RegisterLogger` method with a submission ID that is used to route a message to that logger.
trans-unit.target: 記錄器傳遞至`MuxLogger.RegisterLogger`提交識別碼為用來將訊息路由至該記錄器的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` registers the logger to the `MuxLogger` event source.
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`註冊記錄器`MuxLogger`事件來源。

trans-unit.source: If the build-started event has already been logged, the `MuxLogger` creates a new build-started event and sends it to the logger’s event source.
trans-unit.target: 如果建置開始時間的事件已記錄，`MuxLogger`建立新的組建啟動事件，並將它傳送至記錄器的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` unregisters loggers in the following way:
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`取消註冊的記錄器，方式如下：

trans-unit.source: When a build submission is completed, the `MuxLogger.UnregisterLogger` method is called with the submission ID for the logger.
trans-unit.target: 送出組建完成時，`MuxLogger.UnregisterLogger`提交識別碼記錄器呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` looks up the success state of the project-finished event for the submission ID and logs a build-finished event to the logger.
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`提交識別碼尋找專案完成事件的成功狀態，並建置完成的事件記錄到記錄器。

trans-unit.source: The `MuxLogger` cleans up the event source.
trans-unit.target: `MuxLogger`清除的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Note that the unregister comes from a thread other than the logging thread and a synchronization issue could occur if unregister is called while events are being logged.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，取消註冊來自記錄執行緒以外的執行緒，如果記錄事件時，系統會呼叫取消註冊，可能會發生同步處理問題。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the multiplexing logger.
trans-unit.target: 建立多工記錄器的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see langword="MuxLogger" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="MuxLogger" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the <see langword="MuxLogger" /> instance with the specified event source.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件來源來初始化 <see langword="MuxLogger" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 節點數上限。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the <see langword="MuxLogger" /> instance with the specified event source and specified maximum number of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件來源及指定的節點數目上限，初始化 <see langword="MuxLogger" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the Parameters attribute, required by the <see langword="ILogger" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定 <see langword="ILogger" /> 介面所需的 Parameters 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Parameters attribute.
trans-unit.target: 傳回參數屬性。

trans-unit.source: The submission ID of the logger being registered.
trans-unit.target: 正在註冊之記錄器的提交 ID。

trans-unit.source: The logger to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的記錄器。

trans-unit.source: Registers a logger on the <see langword="MuxLogger" /> and raises a build-started event if the build-started event has already been logged.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see langword="MuxLogger" /> 上註冊記錄器，並在已開始建置事件已記錄時引發已開始建置事件。

trans-unit.source: Shuts down the <see langword="MuxLogger" /> and clears out any state.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 <see langword="MuxLogger" />，並清除任何狀態。

trans-unit.source: The submission ID of the logger to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之記錄器的提交 ID。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified logger from the MuxLogger.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的記錄器從 MuxLogger 中移除。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the method is successful in removing the logger, otherwise, returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法成功移除記錄器，則傳回 <see langword="true" />，否則會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the Verbosity attribute, required by the <see langword="ILogger" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定 <see langword="ILogger" /> 介面所需的 Verbosity 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Verbosity attribute.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 Verbosity 屬性。
